name: Demonstration
summary: The Demonstration module has been carefully developed to provide a quick, thorough, enjoyable, and easy-to-use demonstration of the Texas Instruments Home Computer. Basically, you follow the simple steps outlined below to insert the module into the machine, and it does the rest! Once started, the module takes care of itself-no complex operations are needed. The module is flexible enough to allow for a variety of tailor-made experiences that can be easily selected.
